Verses: 1 boomiyin Kudigale, Neengal Ellaarum Dhevanukku Munbaagak Gembeeramaaip Paadungal.
2 avar Naamaththin Magaththuvaththaik Keerththanampanni, Avarudaiya Thudhiyin Magimaiyaik Kondaadungal.
3 dhevanai Nokki: Umadhu Kiriyaigalil Evvalavu Bayangaramaayirukkireer; Umadhu Magaththuvamaana Vallamaiyinimiththam Ummudaiya Saththurukkal Umakku Ichchagampesi Adanguvaargal.
4 boomiyinmeedhengum Ummaip Panindhukondu Ummaith Thudhiththup Paaduvaargal; Avargal Ummudaiya Naamaththaith Thudhiththup Paaduvaargal Endru Sollungal. (selaa.)
5 dhevanudaiya Seygaigalai Vandhupaarungal, Avar Manupuththiraridaththil Nadappikkung Kiriyaiyil Bayangaramaanavar.
6 kadalai Ularndha Tharaiyaaga Maatrinaar; Aatraik Kaalnadaiyaaik Kadandhaargal; Ange Avaril Kalikoorndhom.
7 avar Thammudaiya Vallamaiyinaal Endrendraikkum Arasaalugiraar; Avarudaiya Kangal Jaadhigalmel Nokkamaayirukkiradhu; Dhurogigal Thangalai Uyarththaadhiruppaargalaaga. (selaa.)
8 janangale, Nammudaiya Dhevanai Sthoththiriththu, Avaraith Thudhikkunsaththaththaik Ketkappannungal.
9 avar Nammudaiya Kaalgalaith Thallaadavottaamal, Nammudaiya Aaththumaavai Uyirode Vaikkiraar.
10 dhevane, Engalaich Sodhiththeer; Velliyaip Pudamidugiradhupola Engalaip Pudamitteer.
11 engalai Valaiyil Agappaduththi, Engal Iduppugalinmel Varuththamaana Baaraththai Etrineer.
12 manusharai Engal Thalaiyinmel Erippogappannineer; Theeyaiyum Thanneeraiyum Kadandhuvandhom; Sezhippaana Idaththil Engalaik Konduvandhu Vitteer.
13 sarvaanga Thaganabaligalode Umadhu Aalayaththirkul Piravesippen;
14 en Ikkattil Naan En Udhadugalaith Thirandhu, En Vaayinaal Solliya En Poruththanaigalai Umakkuch Seluththuven.
15 aattukkadaakkalin Ninappugaiyudane Kozhumaiyaanavaigalai Umakkuth Thaganabaliyaaga Iduven; Kaalaigalaiyum Semmariyaattuk Kadaakkalaiyum Umakkup Baliyiduven. (selaa.)
16 dhevanukkup Bayandhavargale, Neengal Ellaarum Vandhu Kelungal; Avar En Aaththumaavukkuch Seydhadhaich Solluven.
17 avarai Nokki En Vaayinaal Kooppitten, En Naavinaal Avar Pugazhappattaar.
18 en Irudhayaththil Akkiramasindhai Kondirundhenaanaal, Aandavar Enakkuch Sevikodaar.
19 meyyaai Dhevan Enakkuch Sevikoduththaar, En Jebaththin Saththaththaik Kettaar.
20 en Jebaththaith Thallaamalum, Thamadhu Kirubaiyai Ennaivittu Vilakkaamalum Irundha Dhevanukku Sthoththiramundaavadhaaga.
